noBreedingContent.information: It looks like you haven't added any cow herds yet

addHerdModal.validation: Herd name must be filled in
addHerdModal.validationLength3: Herd name must contain a minimum of 3 characters
addHerdModal.validationLength45: Herd name can contain a maximum of 45 characters
addHerdModal.nameRequirements: Herd name must contain from 3 to 45 characters
addHerdModal.text: Adding cows to the herd occurs at a later stage

editHerdModal.nameRequirements: Herd name must contain from 3 to 45 characters

breedingContent.deleteDialogMessage1: Are you sure you want to delete herd:
breedingContent.deleteDialogMessage2: and all information related to it?

addCowModal.subHeader: Cow will be added to the currently selected herd
addCowModal.requirements: To add a cow, provide it's ear tag number, select it's gender and enter it's birth date. Cow's name is optional.

validation.cowNameLength: Cow name can contain a maximum of 45 characters
validation.earTagNumberRequired: Ear tag number must be filled in
validation.earTagNumberLength: Ear tag number must contain exactly 14 characters
validation.earTagNumberPattern: Ear tag number must contain 12 digits preceded by 2 letters
validation.dateOfBirthRequired: Birth date field must be filled in
validation.dateOfBirthPastOrPresent: Birth date cannot be a future date

cowResults.deleteDialogMessage1: Are you sure you want to delete cow with ear tag number:
cowResults.deleteDialogMessage2: and all information related to it?

addMilkingModal.subHeader: Milking will be added to the currently selected cow
addMilkingModal.requirements: To add a milking, provide the milking date (it cannot be earlier than the date of birth) and milk quantity. Milking time is optional.

validation.milkQuantityRange: Milk quantity must be within the range of 0.000 to 999.999
validation.milkQuantityRequired: Milk quantity must be filled in
validation.dateOfMilkingRequired: Date of milking field must be filled in
validation.dateOfMilkingPastOrPresent: Date of milking cannot be a future date
validation.milkingDurationFormat: Provide time in format minutes : seconds

addWeightGainModal.subHeader: Weight measurement will be added to the currently selected cow
addWeightGainModal.requirements: To add a weight measurement, provide the measurement date and weight

validation.weightRange: Weight must be within the range of 0.000 to 999.999
validation.measurementDateRequired: Date of measurement field must be filled in
validation.measurementDatePastOrPresent: Date of measurement cannot be a future date
